column2: Look at these ideal meteorological conditions!
HA HA! I can see so much further here!
This isn't the time for a photo op.
Perhaps our victory lays further ahead.
Things have to look up a little with a view like that!
The meeting place of the heavens and the earth so that we mortals may gaze upon it.
It seems like a clear horizon.
I think... I think I can see camp up ahead!
